section.title: Specifying Additional Input Directories
section.para: The command-line option --include-directory=dir causes the program to include dir into the list of input directories.
This prepends C:\My Styles to the input search path, i.e., C:\My Styles will be searched first, when &TeX; tries to find an input file.
